name: JustApps Technology
tag_list: distracted-driving, mobile, web-2-0, application, android, ios, blackberry, bb, symbian, windows-mobile
overview:
JustApps Technology, a Dallas, Texas based company leverages the talents of a unique group of designers, engineers and project managers who are passionate about using technology to create applications to better the world around us. Each of their apps represents the best possible solution that todayâ€™s technology can offer, brought to you through the hard work and creativity of their people.

Their collective passion and collaboration has spawned the development of numerous applications. The first of which to be released is JustDrive, a mobile app solution that helps deter drivers from texting behind the wheel.

JustDrive was developed to help families and businesses deal with the growing issue of texting while driving, which has become a very serious safety issue on todayâ€™s roads.

Mobile phones and tablets are such a huge part of our daily lives that they wanted to create something positive - something to truly make a difference. The result is JustDrive, and the next generation of similar apps already in progress. JustApps is excited about what they can achieve with these products, and excited to share them with the world.

JustApps Technologies looks forward to partnering with you - individuals, families, and businesses - to help solve some important problems. So start by making the responsible choice, JustDrive!
